content: Stream created by Matt Cuffaro.
Hey, would you want to rename this stream to just "philosophy", "math philosophy" or "categorical philosophy", etc?
Yes, toposophy really is an ugly name!
haha it was a reference to a phrase I read in Moerdijk. Categorical Philosophy would be fine pending another suggestion
Considering that the whole zulip thing is about CT, I think Philosophy would suffice, as @Christian Williams suggests
Christian Williams renamed stream toposophy to philosophy.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

philosophy and category theory | stream named borrowed from Moerdijk.

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: science instead. Philosophy and category theory | stream named borrowed from Moerdijk.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream philosophy to deprecated: philosophy.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Deprecated, use #theory: science instead. Philosophy and category theory | stream named borrowed from Moerdijk.

  • New description:

Philosophy and category theory.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream deprecated: philosophy to theory: philosophy.
